snippet: Michele Bachmann said on Wednesday morning that she would not continue her campaign for the Republican presidential nomination.
abstract: Michele Bachmann said on Wednesday morning that she would not continue her campaign for the Republican presidential nomination.
lead_paragraph: 12:12 p.m. | Updated WEST DES MOINES, Iowa -- On the morning before Iowa's first-in-the-nation caucuses, Representative Michele Bachmann of Minnesota said she was counting on a "miracle" to resurrect her faltering campaign. On the morning after, she acknowledged that it was beyond saving.

headline.main: Bachmann Says She Will Not Continue in the Race
